#Question 1
Sample size $n = 400$, proportion estimate $\hat{p}=0.52$.

#Question 2
Random sample of 50 chocolates. $\hat{\mu}=20$mg and $\hat{\sigma}=4$mg.
Find 90, 95, 99 percent confidence intervals for unknown mean $\mu$ using normal approximation.
